text: The Battle of Beaver Dams, which occurred on June 24, 1813, was a crucial battle during the War of 1812. Following their defeat at Stoney Creek, the Americans sent a force under Lieutenant-Colonel Charles G. Boerstler from Fort George to destroy a British advanced post at Beaver Dams. Category:19th- century battles Category:1813 in North America Category:War of 1812
title: Battle of Beaver Dams
